title: R40959
content: The regional tables provide total dollar values of U.S. defense articles and services sold to top purchasers under the Foreign Military Sales program. Total values for top 10 purchasers worldwide are also included. Delivery values for top purchasers in each region are provided separately. The total dollar values of U.S. defense articles and services delivered under the Foreign Military Sales program to the top 10 purchasers worldwide are provided in Table 12 for the calendar year(s) indicated. Commercial licensed deliveries are excluded for data accuracy concerns.
